snippet: The United Nations refugee agency urged European countries to stop sending back asylum seekers, many of them originally from Syria, because they face poor treatment in Bulgaria.
abstract: United Nations refugee agency says that European countries should stop returning asylum seekers to Bulgaria, because they could face inhuman and degrading treatment in Bulgaria's reception centers.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency urged European countries to stop sending back asylum seekers, many of them originally from Syria, because they face poor treatment in Bulgaria.

headline.main: Returning of Refugees to Bulgaria Worries U.N.
headline.print_headline: Returning Of Refugees To Bulgaria Worries U.N.
